page.title: 05Our Area
page.content: Our study showed that our area is mainly grassland. It does not feel like it however because where we play is mainly buildings. Sometimes the neighbours shout when our ball goes in their garden. There is a swimming baths nearby but it is old so we get the bus to the Sports Centre at Atherton when we want to go swimming. There is a park with swings, slide etc. There is a factory with a massive car park. We go there to play games on Saturdays and Sundays. There are lots of clubs at school but you have to do as you are told. There is a Sports Centre at our school, Hayward, but it gets full. In Summer there are a lot of things to do but in Winter there is nothing. There are a few shops selling sweets and toys but you have to catch the bus into the town centre if you want anything special.
